scenario_text.value: Ryo! Are you all right?!
D-Don’t come any closer!
Uhhh hold up. What the heck is this?

Is that a...giant caterpillar in front of
Ryo?
What is that?! Agumon, do you know?

Hmm, I don’t know this one. But it doesn’t
look mad or anything, y’know?
I believe this one is called... Kunemon.
Kunemon!

(It’s true, Kunemon doesn’t look like he’s
trying to attack him.)
(Even so, Ryo looks pretty scared of him...)

(What should somebody say at a time like
this?)
Maybe let Agumon talk?
Leave it to Minoru.

Hey, are you all right?
I think it just wants to play!
Yikes! Now there’s a dinosaur monster?!
I’m not a monster! I’m Agumon!
Calling us monsters is pretty rude!
I concur.
Argh! Th-they all talk?!

Hey Ryo, Agumon’s not gonna hurt you.
Chill out!

“Chill out”? Who the hell do you think you’re
talking to?!

You guys sure got a lot of attitude at a time
like this...

(It’ll be tough to get Ryo to come with us
while he’s still panicking...)
This guy is a friend of yours, Takuma?
He is human, that is for certain...
He’s kinda pathetic, isn’t he!

What a relief! You must be okay if you can
still be the same old jerk.

Shut your pie hole... Listen, this isn’t the
only thing I saw!

There was this ghost, man... I even saw some
huge monster over there.
Over there? Where?

(At any rate, it looks like Ryo’s got a new
friend in Kunemon.)
(...Kind of.)

(What’s with the ghost and monster Ryo was
talking about, though...?)

(And what’s this feeling? It’s like...
someone’s been watching us for a while.)
(Is something else here with us?)
Shee-hee-hee-hee...
Yeek! Wha- what the heck was that sound?!

You think it was a g-ghost just now? Where’d
it come from?
Over there? Or maybe...

Hey, stop screwing around! There ain’t no
way that—
...What?!

(I definitely heard something, but a ghost?
Maybe we should wait and see what happens...)
Ryo is pretty freaked out, ain’t he?
You think he’s just imagining things?

I fear it’s as he says. Something suspicious
wafts throughout this building.
For real?!
Yeah... Something stinks in here.
What could be so suspiciously stinky?

This place is covered in spiderwebs... How
come we never noticed?

Hey, Takuma... Why don’t you try snapping
a pic over there?
Over there...?
(The place he was looking at before, huh?)

We saw some weird stuff in the pics from the
shrine, maybe it’ll happen again here, right?

Minoru! This is no time to be joking around,
you know!

Hold on, Aoi. We have no idea what’s going on
here, so there’s no harm in trying it out.
Not you too, Takuma! *sigh* Very well...

Sightseeing at a time like this... Ain’t you
just easy-breezy. Fine, do what you want...

(Nothing really stands out to me here. Maybe
I’ll learn something if I use my <color=#B41919>camera</color>...)

Who knows what’ll show up? Come on, get
snappy with the snapping!
